00018 string BiasCurrentUtil::GetBiasCurrentLoggerName(EPolarimeterId polId)
00019 {
00020    switch(RunConfig::GetBeamId(polId))
00021    {
00022       case kBLUE_BEAM:
00023          return "RHIC/Polarimeter/Blue/biasReadbacks";
00024       case kYELLOW_BEAM:
00025          return "RHIC/Polarimeter/Yellow/biasReadbacks";
00026       default:
00027           throw "Unknown beam type";
00028    }
00029 }

00031 
00032 EPolarimeterId BiasCurrentUtil::ParseLoggerPolId(const std::string &cell_name)
00033 {
00034 #define CHAR_PAIR(c1, c2) (((uint16_t)c1) << 8) | ((uint16_t)c2)
00035    switch(CHAR_PAIR(cell_name[0], cell_name[10]))
00036    {
00037    case CHAR_PAIR('b', '1'):
00038       return kB1U;
00039    case CHAR_PAIR('y', '1'):
00040       return kY1D;
00041    case CHAR_PAIR('b', '2'):
00042       return kB2D;
00043    case CHAR_PAIR('y', '2'):
00044       return kY2U;
00045    default:
00046       throw "Can't parse polarimeter";
00047    }
00048 #undef CHAR_PAIR
00049 }
00050 
00051 
00052 vector<double> BiasCurrentUtil::FillBiasCurrentMeanValue(opencdev::mean_result_t &bias_mean_value, EPolarimeterId polId)
00053 {
00054    vector<double> result(N_DETECTORS);
00055 
00056    for(map<string, double>::const_iterator it = bias_mean_value.begin(); it != bias_mean_value.end(); it++) {
00057       const string &key = it->first;
00058       double value = it->second;
00059       gSystem->Info("BiasCurrentUtil::FillBiasCurrentMeanValue", "Mean %s equals to %f", key.c_str(), value);
00060 
00061       EPolarimeterId parsed_polId = ParseLoggerPolId(key);
00062       if (parsed_polId != polId)
00063       {
00064          continue;
00065       }
00066 
00067       if (fabs(value) > 100)
00068       {
00069          gSystem->Error("BiasCurrentUtil::FillBiasCurrentMeanValue", "Bias cureent value is too big - Ignoring");
00070       }
00071       else if (!isnan(value))
00072       {
00073          int det_id = key[15] - '1';
00074          result.at(det_id) = value;
00075       }
00076    }
00077 
00078    return result;
00079 }
